mapper.select: SELECT revi.REVI_NO, revi.REVI_CONTENT, revi.REVI_STAR, revi.REVI_REG_DATE, revi.REVI_MOD_DATE, revi.REVI_IP, revi.REVI_USER_ID, revi.REVI_PARENT_NO, u.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME FROM REVIEWS revi INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = revi.revi_user_id WHERE revi.REVI_PARENT_NO = #{prodNo} ORDER BY revi.REVI_NO DESC
